entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of light snow beginning early this evening and ending overnight. Local amount 2 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 4. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly cloudy. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the afternoon. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Friday 24 March 2023
